description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nOn A Pale Horse:
Your creatures' {CONDNAME_MINION_CONQUEST}, {CONDNAME_MINION_DEATH}, {CONDNAME_MINION_FAMINE}, and {CONDNAME_MINION_WAR} are 100% more powerful. This trait does not stack.
name: Countess Chalice
